Package com.github.tommyettinger.colorful

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorfulBatch
    A substitute for SpriteBatch that adds an additional attribute to store an extra color's worth of channels, used to modify the luma and chromatic channels of a color by multiplication (called the "tweak") while the primary color affects the color additively (just called the color, often drawn from Palette or generated with FloatColors).
    ColorfulSprite
    Holds the geometry, color, and texture information for drawing 2D sprites using ColorfulBatch.
    FloatColors
    Various utility methods for working with colors encoded as packed YCwCmA floats.
    Palette
    A palette of predefined colors as packed YCwCmA floats, the kind FloatColors works with.
    Shaders
    Constants that contain the critical shader code to construct a ShaderProgram that can render the rest of this library.
    TrigTools
    Some alternative approximations to sin(), cos(), asin(), acos(), and atan2(), including the option to measure most values in turns instead of radians (where 1 turn equals 2pi radians).
